title: Feta and chickpea salad
ingredients: ['2 Little Gem lettuces, separated into leaves', '4 ripe tomatoes, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and cut into 1 cm (½ in) squares', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced', '1 cucumber, cut into quarters lengthways andthen into chunks', '1 can chickpeas, about 410 g, drained and rinsed', '60 g (2¼ oz) stoned black olives, preferably Greek Kalamata olives', '150 g (5½ oz) feta cheese, cut into small cubes', 'Parsley and mustard dressing', '3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1½ tbsp lemon juice', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', '3 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', 'pepper']
